item.title: 股市平静掩盖了个股剧烈波动
item.description: 巴克莱银行策略师指出，美国股市数月来弥漫的平静氛围，掩盖了个股中前所未有的剧烈波动。【原文：The sense of calm that has pervaded the US stock market for months is masking unprecedented bursts of volatility in individual shares, say Barclays Plc strategists.】

item.title: 苹果与科技硬件股面临"危机"，内存价格飙升
item.description: 内存和存储元件价格的飙升，使闪迪公司、美光科技公司和西部数据公司等企业成为过去一年市场中最热门的股票。但这对许多客户来说却成了难题。【原文：Soaring prices for memory and storage components have turned companies like Sandisk Corp., Micron Technology Inc. and Western Digital Corp. into the hottest stocks in the market over the past year. But they’re causing headaches for many of their customers.】

item.title: 加拿大房市冬季遇冷，房价与销量双双下滑
item.description: 加拿大房地产市场以低迷态势结束2025年，受经济不确定性影响，购房者纷纷退场，导致成交量与房价双双下滑。【原文：The Canadian housing market ended 2025 on a down note, with both sales and prices declining as economic uncertainty kept buyers away.】

item.title: 甲骨文试图吸引员工迁往纳什维尔，为新设"全球"总部招兵买马
item.description: 甲骨文公司正努力——有时颇费周折——吸引员工前往纳什维尔，该公司正在当地开发一座大型滨河总部。【原文：Oracle Corp. is trying — and sometimes struggling — to attract workers to Nashville, where it is developing a massive riverfront headquarters.】

item.title: 肯尼亚遭排除在免税协定外后，正与中国进行贸易谈判
item.description: 肯尼亚与中国就贸易协定展开谈判，此前这个东非国家被排除在北京给予免关税和免配额准入待遇的最不发达国家名单之外。【原文：Kenya began talks with China for a trade deal after the East African nation was excluded from a list of least developed nations countries granted duty- and quota-free access by Beijing.】

item.title: 英国烟草公司将终止南非卷烟生产以打击非法贸易
item.description: 英美烟草公司南非子公司表示，由于非法贸易导致销量萎缩且运营难以维系，该公司将终止当地香烟生产。【原文：British American Tobacco Plc’s South Africa subsidiary said it will end local production of cigarettes after illicit trade shrank volumes and made operating unviable.】

item.title: 菲律宾将与印尼、马来西亚一道阻止马斯克的Grok
item.description: 据马尼拉一位高级政府官员透露，菲律宾将与马来西亚和印度尼西亚一道，封禁埃隆·马斯克的Grok人工智能系统。此举源于人们对该人工智能系统生成性化图像的担忧日益加剧。【原文：The Philippines will join Malaysia and Indonesia in blocking Elon Musk’s Grok AI amid growing concerns over sexualized images generated by the artificial intelligence system, according to a top government official in Manila.】

item.title: 佳能瞄准医疗设备和芯片工具领域潜在交易
item.description: 佳能公司表示，未来几年将探索在医疗设备和芯片工具等利润丰厚的领域进行收购，同时将股息支付率目标下调至约40%。【原文：Canon Inc. said it will explore acquisitions in lucrative arenas such as medical devices and chip tools in the coming years, while setting a lower dividend payout target of around 40%.】

item.title: 泰国两天内发生第二起致命起重机事故，造成两人死亡
item.description: 泰国沙没颂堪府一处在建高架公路上，一辆起重机坍塌坠落至道路，造成至少两人死亡。就在前一天，泰国另一起起重机事故还造成32人丧生。【原文：At least two people were killed when a crane collapsed from an under-construction elevated expressway onto a road in Thailand’s Samut Sakhon province, just one day after a similar accident involving a crane left 32 dead.】

item.title: 据称日本央行正加强对日元疲软价格影响的关注
item.description: 知情人士称，日本央行官员正日益关注日元对通胀的潜在影响，这可能对下周可能维持利率不变后的未来加息决策产生影响。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are paying increasing attention to the yen’s potential impact on inflation, with possible implications for future rate hikes after a likely hold decision next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国批准总值31亿美元的新数据中心项目
item.description: 泰国批准了价值969亿泰铢（约合31亿美元）的提案，用于建设新的数据中心和数据托管项目，彰显了这个东南亚国家正崛起为区域技术枢纽。【原文：Thailand approved proposals worth 96.9 billion baht ($3.1 billion) to build new data centers and data-hosting projects, underscoring the Southeast Asian nation’s emergence as a regional technology hub.】

item.title: 英国考虑对儿童实施澳大利亚式社交媒体禁令
item.description: 英国正考虑效仿澳大利亚，对16岁以下儿童实施社交媒体禁令，此举源于社会各界日益高涨的呼声，要求对易受伤害的年轻用户实施保护性限制。【原文：The UK is considering following Australia in imposing a social media ban for children under 16 years old, amid growing calls for restrictions to protect vulnerable younger users.】

item.title: 德国经济自2022年以来首次实现增长，主要得益于消费支出。
item.description: 德国经济自2022年以来首次实现增长，政府大规模支出助力该国摆脱了长期的工业衰退。【原文：Germany’s economy grew for the first year since 2022 as a government spending spree helps the country overcome its lengthy industrial slump.】

item.title: 莫桑比克领导人预计液化天然气项目将在数周内全面重启
item.description: 莫桑比克总统丹尼尔·查波预计，道达尔能源公司价值200亿美元的液化天然气项目最早将于本月重启，这将为资金短缺的政府重振一项潜在的关键收入来源。【原文：Mozambican President Daniel Chapo expects TotalEnergies SE’s $20 billion liquefied natural gas project to restart as early as this month, reviving a potentially key revenue source for the cash-strapped government.】

item.title: 印度12月贸易逆差扩大，美国关税持续走高
item.description: 印度12月贸易逆差扩大，因美国高关税持续对出口商构成压力。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened in December, as elevated US tariffs continued to pressure exporters.】

item.title: 诺沃基金将捐赠创纪录的8.6亿美元用于新生物科学资助
item.description: 诺和诺德A/S控股基金将向丹麦一家生命科学机构捐赠高达55亿丹麦克朗（约合8.6亿美元）的款项，创下该基金史上最大规模捐赠，旨在推动欧洲创新与就业发展。【原文：The fund controlling Novo Nordisk A/S will make the largest donation in its history with a grant worth as much as 5.5 billion kroner ($860 million) for a Danish life science organization to help boost European innovation and jobs.】

item.title: 英国东南水务公司因断水事件面临新调查
item.description: 英国水务监管机构Ofwat若在最新调查中认定东南水务公司（South East Water Ltd.）在近期停水期间违反客户服务许可条款，该公司可能面临高达其营业额10%的罚款。【原文：South East Water Ltd. could be fined as much as 10% of its turnover if a new investigation by industry regulator Ofwat finds the UK company breached licence conditions over customer care during recent outages.】

item.title: ASML市值突破5000亿美元大关，得益于台积电乐观展望
item.description: ASML控股公司股价飙升至历史新高，市值突破5000亿美元大关。此前其重要客户台湾积体电路制造公司（台积电）给出了超出预期的2026年业绩展望。【原文：ASML Holding NV shares soared to a record high, sending its market value beyond $500 billion, after its key customer Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. gave a stronger-than-anticipated outlook for 2026.】

item.title: Revolut董事长在当地备案文件中登记为瑞士居民
item.description: 根据这家全球金融科技公司设立新部门的相关当地公司备案文件显示，Revolut Ltd.董事长马丁·吉尔伯特已披露其长期居住于瑞士。【原文：Revolut Ltd. Chairman Martin Gilbert has disclosed a long-standing residency in Switzerland, according to local company filings related to the setting up of a new unit of the global fintech firm.】

item.title: 中国国家电网计划到2030年投资额激增40%
item.description: 中国国家电网公司计划在未来五年内将投资额提升至4万亿元人民币（约合5740亿美元），以加速电力网络建设，满足不断增长的电力需求，并推动可再生能源的全面发展。【原文：The State Grid Corp. of China plans to boost spending to 4 trillion yuan ($574 billion) over the next five years, as the nation races to expand its power network to keep pace with rising electricty demand and build-out of renewables.】

item.title: 爱立信计划在瑞典裁员1600人以推进成本削减计划
item.description: 爱立信公司计划裁减约1600个岗位，这家瑞典网络设备供应商正致力于降低运营成本。【原文：Ericsson AB plans to cut about 1,600 jobs, as the Swedish network equipment supplier looks to reduce its operational costs.】

item.title: 伦敦金融交易所集团启动全新数字结算平台，加速推进区块链应用
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团已推出一项支持区块链的新型数字结算服务，该交易所运营商正深化对支撑加密货币技术的应用。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group Plc has launched a new blockchain-friendly digital settlement service, as the bourse operator deepens its use of the technology underpinning cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 香港法院下令中国建筑商景瑞清盘
item.description: 香港高等法院下令清盘开发商景瑞控股有限公司，成为中国持续多年的房地产危机中，最新一家在该市被清盘的中国违约建筑商。【原文：Hong Kong’s High Court ordered the liquidation of developer Jingrui Holdings Ltd., making it the latest defaulted Chinese builder to be wound up in the city amid China’s years-long property crisis.】

item.title: 吉姆·拉特克利夫削减法国足球俱乐部尼斯的收购价格
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁吉姆·拉特克利夫已大幅下调法国足球俱乐部尼斯队的要价。【原文：Billionaire Jim Ratcliffe has slashed the asking price for French football team OGC Nice, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 泰勒温佩公司认为英国房屋销售旺季需求“疲软”
item.description: 泰勒温佩公司表示，英国住房市场持续受困于疲软需求，购房者因抵押贷款成本高企而陷入困境，这已严重削弱了购房能力。【原文：The UK housing marked continues to be blighted by lackluster demand as buyers struggle with elevated mortgage costs that have stretched affordability, according to Taylor Wimpey Plc.】

item.title: 中国人民银行下调结构性利率以促进定向贷款
item.description: 中国央行将下调结构性货币政策工具利率0.25个百分点，在2026年伊始加大对经济的定向支持力度。【原文：China’s central bank will lower interest rates on its structural monetary policy tools by 0.25 percentage points, stepping up targeted support for the economy as it enters 2026.】

item.title: 微软因许可费问题遭瑞士监管机构调查
item.description: 瑞士竞争委员会已针对微软公司在该国向客户收取的许可费展开初步调查，此前该机构收到关于近期价格上涨的投诉。【原文：Switzerland’s competition commission has begun a preliminary investigation into Microsoft Corp. over the licensing fees it charges clients in the country after receiving complaints over recent price increases.】

item.title: 裕信银行驳斥蒙特帕斯基收购传闻为"毫无根据"
item.description: 裕信银行表示，近期媒体关于其有意收购竞争对手西恩纳蒙特帕斯基银行股份的报道“毫无根据”。【原文：UniCredit SpA said that recent media reports about its interest in potentially buying a stake in rival Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA were “unjustified.”】
